task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain) with cell-type labels. Using expression-only data, subset cells labeled ASTROCYTE (from adata.obs). Within ASTROCYTE, perform a two-group t-test differential expression comparing 90wk (OLD) vs 4wk (JUVENILE) (logFC > 0 for OLD, adj p ≤ 0.05). Rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj). Use gene symbols from adata.var['feature_name'] when available, otherwise from adata.var_names; convert to UPPERCASE, deduplicate, and remove Ensembl-style IDs. Return the top OLD-upregulated astrocyte genes as markers_predicted.

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.50 (≈ ≥80% overlap with 8 GT markers using top-13).
